channel.title: [PI] very simple question regarding opening quest interface
channel.description:
this is simple but in clickingbuttons.java i have
[code]case 7732:[/code]
What do i add under it to make it so when you click on that button it opens a blank quest interface with any text i want on it and how do i add the text to the interface?
